data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Artem Timofeev of Samara gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Sergey Karasev signals a Tambow throw-in in Samara's half.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Samara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambow's half?
Throw-in for Samara close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Samara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Samara.
Mikhail Kostyukov of Tambow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Georgi Melkadze for Tambow drives towards goal at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Obukhov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tambow.
Samara have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Throw-in high up the field for Samara in Nizhny Novgorod.
Ball safe as Tambow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Samara.
Samara have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Samara push upfield but Sergey Karasev quickly pulls them for offside.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambow.
In Nizhny Novgorod Tambow drive forward through [47]. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Tambow.
In Nizhny Novgorod, Georgi Melkadze (Tambow) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Samara at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Samara's Dmitri Kabutov misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Samara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tambow needs to be cautious. Samara have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Samara.
Tambow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Dmitri Kabutov (Samara) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Tambow in the half of Samara.
Tambow to take a throw-in in Samara territory.
Throw-in for Samara in their own half.
Can Tambow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Samara's half?
Denis Popovic (Samara) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Tambow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Samara in the half of Tambow.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Samara, close to Tambow's area.
Ball safe as Tambow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Georgi Melkadze puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Sergey Karasev awards Tambow a goal kick.
In Nizhny Novgorod a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Tambow in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Free kick for Tambow in the half of Samara.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Georgi Melkadze.
Tambow's Georgi Melkadze looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Tambow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tambow surge into the attack at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium but [49]â€™s header is off-target.
Sergey Karasev awards Samara a goal kick.
Tambow to take a throw-in in Samara territory.
Samara have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tambow's Mikhail Kostyukov goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mikhail Kostyukov for Tambow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Tambow.
Tambow drives forward and [47] gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
At Nizhny Novgorod Stadium, Nikita Chernov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Timur Shipshev (Tambow) has taken off Mikhail Kostyukov who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Artyom Fedchuk is the replacement.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambow in their own half.
Igor Yurganov is replacing Adessoye Oyewole for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Dejan Radonjic (Samara) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Throw-in for Tambow in the half of Samara.
In Nizhny Novgorod a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tambow attack but Vladimir Obukhov's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Samara are pushing forward but Dmitri Kabutov's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambow.
Samara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Samara pushes forward through Dmitri Kabutov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Samara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambow's half?
Free kick for Tambow in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Tambow throw-in in Samara's half.
It's now 2-0 in Nizhny Novgorod as Vladimir Obukhov scores for Tambow.
The away team replace Dejan Radonjic with Egor Golenkov.
Sergey Karasev signals a Samara throw-in in Tambow's half.
Free kick in a good position for Samara!
Samara's Aleksandr Anyukov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Samara in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambow.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Samara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Georgi Melkadze is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Throw-in Tambow.
Free kick Samara.
Anton Kilin (Tambow) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Tambow awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Maksim Glushenkov with Dmitri Kombarov. This is the second substitution made today by Miodrag Bozovic.
Throw-in for Samara at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
In Nizhny Novgorod a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Samara are coming forward and [49] gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sergey Karasev awards Tambow a goal kick.
Ball safe as Tambow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Samara have a dangerous throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambow in their own half.
Aleksandr Anyukov for Samara has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nizhny Novgorod to check on [36], who is grimacing with pain.
[36] returns to the field for [37] after picking up a slight injury.
Samara are pushing forward but Mehdi Zeffane's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Throw-in for Samara in the half of Tambow.
Free kick for Samara in the half of Tambow.
Can Samara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambow's half?
Samara attack but [47]'s header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Throw-in Samara.
Tambow have a goal kick.
Samara to take a throw-in in Tambow territory.
Samara have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Khasan Mamtov is on a sub for Vladimir Obukhov for Tambow.
Mehdi Zeffane (Samara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Samara.
Samara have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Anton Kilin puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Great play from Giorgi Shelia to set up the goal.
Samara have a dangerous throw-in.
Sergey Karasev awards Tambow a goal kick.
Samara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Artyom Fedchuk (Tambow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Samara's Aleksandr Anyukov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Samara make their third substitution with Safaa Hadi replacing Artem Timofeev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Samara.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Throw-in for Samara in their own half.
At Nizhny Novgorod Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Samara.
Sergey Karasev signals a Samara throw-in in Tambow's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Samara in Nizhny Novgorod.
Safaa Hadi of Samara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tambow have a goal kick.
Samara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Khasan Mamtov for Tambow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Tambow drive upfield and Artyom Fedchuk gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Samara defender.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
